001package net.tnemc.plugincore.core.module.cache;
002
003import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.module.ModuleUpdateChecker;
004import org.w3c.dom.Document;
005import org.w3c.dom.Element;
006import org.w3c.dom.Node;
007import org.w3c.dom.NodeList;
008
009import java.util.ArrayList;
010import java.util.HashMap;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.Optional;
014
015/*

026 * MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
027 * GNU Affero General Public License for more details.

029 * You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
030 * along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
031 */
032public class ModuleFileCache {
033
034  protected final Map<String, List<ModuleFile>> moduleFiles = new HashMap<>();
035
036  public Optional<ModuleFile> getModule(String url, String module) {
037    for(ModuleFile file : moduleFiles.getOrDefault(url, new ArrayList<>())) {
038      if(file.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(module)) return Optional.of(file);
039    }
040    return Optional.empty();
041  }
042
043  public List<ModuleFile> getModules(String url) {
044    if(!moduleFiles.containsKey(url)) {
045      populateModules(url);
046    }
047
048    return moduleFiles.getOrDefault(url, new ArrayList<>());
049  }
050
051  private void populateModules(String url) {
052
053    List<ModuleFile> modulesList = new ArrayList<>();
054
055    Optional<Document> document = ModuleUpdateChecker.readUpdateURL(url);
056    if(document.isPresent()) {
057      Document doc = document.get();
058
059      NodeList mainNodes = doc.getElementsByTagName("modules");
060      if(mainNodes != null && mainNodes.getLength() > 0) {
061        Node modulesNode = mainNodes.item(0);
062        Element element = (Element)modulesNode;
063
064        NodeList modules = element.getElementsByTagName("module");
065
066        for(int i = 0; i < modules.getLength(); i++) {
067          Node moduleNode = modules.item(i);
068
069          if(moduleNode.hasAttributes()) {
070
071            Node nameNode = moduleNode.getAttributes().getNamedItem("name");
072            if (nameNode != null) {
073
074              Node releasedNode = moduleNode.getAttributes().getNamedItem("released");
075              if (releasedNode != null) {
076                if(releasedNode.getTextContent().equalsIgnoreCase("yes")) {
077
078                  //We have the correct name, and this module is released.
079                  Element moduleElement = (Element)moduleNode;
080
081                  NodeList versions = moduleElement.getElementsByTagName("versions");
082
083                  if(versions != null && versions.getLength() > 0) {
084
085                    NodeList versionsNodes = moduleElement.getElementsByTagName("version");
086
087                    for(int v = 0; v < versionsNodes.getLength(); v++) {
088
089                      Node versionNode = versionsNodes.item(v);
090                      if(versionNode != null && versionNode.hasAttributes()) {
091
092                        Element versionElement = (Element)versionNode;
093
094                        Node latest = versionNode.getAttributes().getNamedItem("latest");
095                        Node versionReleased = versionNode.getAttributes().getNamedItem("released");
096
097                        if(latest != null && latest.getTextContent().equalsIgnoreCase("yes") &&
098                            versionReleased != null && versionReleased.getTextContent().equalsIgnoreCase("yes")) {
099
100                          //We have the latest module version
101                          NodeList name = versionElement.getElementsByTagName("name");
102                          NodeList jar = versionElement.getElementsByTagName("jar");
103
104                          String current = "";
105                          String jarURL = "";
106
107                          if(name != null && name.getLength() > 0) {
108                            current = name.item(0).getTextContent();
109                          }
110
111                          if(jar != null && jar.getLength() > 0) {
112                            jarURL = jar.item(0).getTextContent();
113                          }
114                          modulesList.add(new ModuleFile(nameNode.getTextContent(), current, jarURL));
115                        }
116                      }
117                    }
118
119                  }
120
121                }
122
123              }
124            }
125          }
126        }
127      }
128    }
129
130    moduleFiles.put(url, modulesList);
131  }
132}
